hints.content:
$596 -{\goldE{?}}= 49$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 596 back to point 49 is labeled, minus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e094b337e8866b1d9125607590be1a4b5319079a)

Let's start by subtracting hundreds from ${596}$ until we get as close to  ${49}$ as possible without going below ${49}$.

$\begin{align}
{596} -\purpleD{100}=496\\\\
{496} -\purpleD{100}= 396\\\\
{396} -\purpleD{100}= 296\\\\
{296} -\purpleD{100}= 196\\\\
{196} -\purpleD{100}= 96
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\purpleD{5 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{5 00}$, we reach $96$. We cannot subtract any more hundreds without going below ${49}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 596 back to a new point 96 labeled, "minus 500"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fa68600469d271213ea69ae326b8d9b625b733fc)

Next, let's subtract tens from $96$ until we get as close to  ${49}$ as possible without going below ${49}$.

$\begin{align}
96 -\blueD{10}=86\\\\
{86} -\blueD{10}= 76\\\\
{76} -\blueD{10}= 66\\\\
{66} -\blueD{10}= 56
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\blueD{4 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{40}$, we reach $56$. We cannot subtract any more tens without going below ${49}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 96 back to a new point 56 labeled, "minus 40"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1270ae4e604451728499d4d56b27ce0915bb829a)

Finally, how many ones should we subtract from $56$ to get to  ${49}?$

$\begin{align}
56-\greenD{6} &= 50\\\\
50-\greenD{1} &= 49
\end{align}$

We subtract $\greenD{7\text{ ones}}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 56 back to point 49 labeled, "minus 7"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/08a558a3af01df5e014230a115c439e0df0ca1be)

We subtracted $\purpleD{5 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{4 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{7\text{ ones}}$ from ${596}$ to get to ${49}$.

$\purpleD{5 00}+\blueD{4 0}+\greenD{7}=\goldE{547}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 596 to point 49 is labeled, "minus 547." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "minus 500," "minus 40," and "minus 7."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/09a599e693d3ca33d811fde0ff277326bd491724)
